description: Pursuing a B. Tech Degree at one of the reputed institutes of India, I try to be the best version of myself!
Developed a real estate website using React for code reusability and better user experience, and also designed the brand logo for the startup using Canva.
Created an event registration form using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
I spent my school days here, where I explored various domains such as sports, drama, dancing, and many more.
